title: Lembas (4R75)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Elven
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Possession
Game Text:	To play, spot 3 Elves. Bearer must be a companion. Regroup: Discard this possession to reconcile your hand.
Lore:	“Sam thought that it tasted far better, somehow, than it had for a good while….”
Rarity:	R
